9 package org.locationtech.geomesa.utils.cache
10 
11 import org.geotools.api.feature.simple.SimpleFeatureType
12 import org.locationtech.geomesa.utils.geotools.SimpleFeatureTypes
13 
14 object CacheKeyGenerator {
15 
16   /**
17     * Encodes the simple feature type fo use as a cache key. Note that this encodes all user data, not just
18     * geomesa-prefixed ones
19     *
20     * @param sft simple feature type
21     * @return
22     */
23   def cacheKey(sft: SimpleFeatureType): String =
24     s"${sft.getName};${SimpleFeatureTypes.encodeType(sft)}${SimpleFeatureTypes.encodeUserData(sft.getUserData)}"
25 
26   /**
27     * Restores a simple feature type from a cache key
28     *
29     * @param key cache key
30     * @return
31     */
32   def restore(key: String): SimpleFeatureType = {
33     val i = key.indexOf(';')
34     SimpleFeatureTypes.createImmutableType(key.substring(0, i), key.substring(i + 1))
35   }
36 }
